profileNotes: The Venge Zerker build is designed for powerful combos using Vengeance in PvP. With 75 Attack, it can wield godswords, whips, and other high-level weaponry. The 99 Strength maximizes melee damage output, and 45 Defence allows the use of Zerker Helm and other Rune-level gear. 94 Magic is chosen for Vengeance, while 70 Prayer grants access to Piety for increased melee prowess.
